pageContext.claim: “And then what happened, it was funny. They said, he was terrible! He was so rough with Chairman Kim! Kim Jong-un. He was so rough!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump says he was criticized for being too rough on Kim Jong-Un, but this seems like revisionism. Overwhelmingly and across the ideological spectrum, Trump was criticized for being too cozy with a notorious dictator in exchange for a vague commitment to denuclearize.
